category: Point at which water must be returned
description:
(i) The Licence Holder shall ensure that <<discharge volume/ all>> water abstracted in pursuance of this licence shall be returned to the source of supply specified in condition <<condition no.>>.
(ii) The Licence Holder shall return water via a borehole at National Grid Reference <<discharge NGR>> on the map <<reference>> marked <<discharge point ref>>.
(iii) The Licence Holder shall return water <<on the same day that /within 24 hours of>> abstraction takes place.
